      • Line

        Line(double a,
     double b,

    • メソッドの詳細

      • pointsToLine

        public static Line pointsToLine(double x1,
                                double y1,
                                double x2,
                                double y2)
        パラメータ:
        x1 - x of A
        y1 - y of A
        x2 - x of B
        y2 - y of B
        戻り値:
        line which goes through A(x1, y1) and B(x2, y2)

      • getIntersectionPoint

        public Point2D getIntersectionPoint(Line line)
        パラメータ:
        line - to look for an intersection point with
        戻り値:
        intersection point of this and line or null if lines are parallel

      • on

        public boolean on(Point2D point)
        パラメータ:
        point - to check
        戻り値:
        if the point is on this.
